settings.custom_liquid:
Red algae is basically your skin’s superfood. It is so powerful and has so many benefits even we don’t know them all yet. Yes, that is the truth. Imagine emptying the contents of your entire skincare cupboard, mixing it up into a vat and slathering it across your skin? No. Well, you kind of get the picture.

Astaxanthin contains ten times more vitamin A than retinol, 6,000 times more potent than vitamin C, 550 times more potent than vitamin E and contains all five B vitamins. It also is more hydrating than hyaluronic acid and contains high levels of antioxidants, anti-inflammatories, and anti-microbial properties. Like we said, a superfood.

One of the main ‘powers’ of red algae is the fact that it’s a super antioxidant. Why? Red algae in the deep ocean would have been destroyed by ultraviolet light without a powerful antioxidant. In order to survive these ultraviolet radiations, the algae has evolved a bioactive compound called Astaxanthin - nature's strongest known antioxidant.

It’s been clinically tested against acne, redness, wrinkles, fine lines, hyperpigmentation…and it works.

The Astaxanthin changes the way your skin behaves. So, it changes it for good. It helps to reinforce the skin’s barrier by creating healthy cells and it encourages your skin to heal all by itself.

Red Algae, The Sustainable Choice For Your Skin And The Planet Our red algae gel changes the way your skin behaves. It’s been clinically proven and has 100% natural ingredients – it’s natural and it works. We know there is a lot of skepticism around the efficacy of natural products which is why we did a clinical trial to prove to the world that nature is not a cause to be messed with.

Because it’s natural there are zero side-effects. That’s right. Zero. No dry skin, no redness, no irritations, just incredible skin in as little as 28 days (although you will start to notice the benefits from the first few uses).

If you are using our gel to help with a specific skin complaint it will be much easier to notice the benefits. If you are trialing our gel for the first time for hydration or anti-wrinkles or just because you want to see how red algae can work for you, you may not be able to define the benefits straight away. That dewy, soft, supple skin – that’s our red algae working. You’ll notice the difference when you stop, we promise. It’s like a gentle, daily microdermabrasion for your face. The sort of thing celebrities would get every day. Because there are no side-effects you can use our gel every day. We also want to be sustainable for the planet. We believe in the power of good and protecting our world for generations to come. All our packaging is fully recyclable, and we offer refills at a 15% discount. We plant a tree with every purchase in the Madagascan rainforest. The production process of red algae itself, lowers carbon dioxide in the atmosphere, making a positive impact on the environment.

We believe that real skin is beautiful. Glowing, gorgeous skin exists in everybody. Unmask the real you today.
Ready to plant your tree ?
